name: Bicycle Beat'em Up
description:
Made for Lisp Game Jam 2018

You play as a cyclist at Kotti, a high traffic roundabout in Berlin, DE.

Defend yourself against cars and their dangerous driving style by pressing the space bar in time. 

Just like in real life, you only have one life.

Good luck!

Written in ClojureScript with play-cljs, code available on GitHub under EPL-2.0.
